page.title: 11INDUSTRY AND EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most light industry in Dunmow is situated on the industrial estates.We found a small company called Triton Electronics,employing seven people operating from Bigod's Hall.We interviewed Mr Tapp who is a partner in the busisness and he discovered that the Elizabethan building had been used in the 1900's by Lady Warwick to house a progressive school.In the 1950 Kelvin Hughes produced radar equipment there.Triton make laboratory test equipment for water and chemical companies and they export 60% of their products.There is a small forge near the church producing ornamental iron work.Many residents have expressed concern that shops are being replaced by hairdressers,building socities and restaurants.There are many new job opportunities in Dunmow,but most of our paents work outside the town.
